Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector:





Vehement watched as his only two minions entered the bridge.
"My brotheres, rejoice!  My search is over!  The Brotherhood will soon become 
stronger than it has ever been!"

Sun Crusher and Reflector exchanged confused looks, remembering being ordered 
to not mention their true faction.

"I have found the location of the Divine One."

"Amazing..." Sun Crusher said slowly.

Reflector stood in awe.

"But we require the Key."

"Where is it?"

"The depths of the Cybertronian Fire's holds."

"But that's impenetrable!" Sun Crusher yelled.

"Is it?" Vehement asked with a smile.  "The Alliance has almost defeated the 
ship itself.  Soon it will be breached!  And we will rule all." Vehement left 
the bridge, followed by his two minions.

The three Brotherhood members walked to the nearest access hatch, launching 
into the air, heading from Mongolia in a southeastern direction towards 
Africa, leaving the Brotherhood base on red alert.
